chunk:
Klur Symmetry Fluid Skin Supplement  (2020 formulation)

Brand: Klur

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: : Camellia Sinensis (*Green Tea) Leaf Water, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape Seed) Extract, Ginkgo Biloba Extract (*Ginkgo), Olive (**Squalane), Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Haematococcus Pluvialis E

tococcus Pluvialis Extract (Astaxanthin),Fulvic Acid, Centella Asiatica Extract (Gotu Kola), Aloe Barbadensis Juice (*Aloe), LaminariaExtract (Red Algae), L-Glutathione, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tamarindus Indica (Tamarind) Seed Extract, *Glycerin, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil (**Camellia), Rosa Canina Seed Oil (*Rosehips),Taraxacum Officinale Extract (*D

ficinale Extract (*Dandelion),Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Vaccinium MacrocarponOil (*Cranberry), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter/Fair Trade),Rubus Idaeus Oil (*Raspberry Seed),Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry)Fruit Extract, Schisandra ChinensisExtract (Schisandra), EquisetumArvense Extract (*Horsetail), SilybumMarianum Extract (*Milk Thistl

xtract (*Milk Thistle),Nigra Fruit Extract (Elderberry), Thymus Vulgaris Extract (**Thyme), Superoxide Dismutase, Citric Acid Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Cancer; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
